info.name: Metatag CMS Detection
author: dadevel
info.description: Generic CMS Detection using html meta generator tag

Host: www.cng.sante.fr

Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.cng.sante.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Cache-Control: must-revalidate, no-cache, private Content-Language: fr Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 15 May 2022 05:33:03 GMT Expires: Sun, 19 Nov 1978 05:00:00 GMT Link: ; rel="shortlink", ; rel="canonical" Link: ; rel="revision" Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-cng.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!e2RcklkhuSBASGasm7p0I5CraKeLeMYwzrKWsFNZPWnA4dPuRUzpmPutgUpPZ1WI1VMkTfA5OhHLusJQFyFaBc21UmM=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Generator: Drupal 8 (https://www.drupal.org) X-Ua-Compatible: IE=edge X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block CNG | Centre National de Gestion des Praticiens Hospitaliers et des Personnels de Direction de la Fonction Publique Hospitalière Aller au contenu principal

info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 265
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.cng.sante.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 265
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.cng.sante.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.cng.sante.fr.	1164	IN	CNAME	cng.sante.fr.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
sante.fr.	1200	IN	SOA	a.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr. dnsmaster.sante.gouv.fr. 2022051300 14400 1800 2592000 1200

info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches for missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.
